c2d 0.0.9040

  • C2D Codebook

List available topics

Source: R/c2d.gen.R
topics.Rd

Lists the set of available referendum topics on the specified tiers.

topics(tiers = 1:3)

Arguments

tiers

Tiers to include topics from. An integerish vector.

Value

A character vector.

See also

Other referendum topic functions: data_topics, hierarchize_topics_fast(), hierarchize_topics(), infer_topics()

Examples

c2d::topics(tiers = 1:2)
#>  [1] "state organisation"                   
#>  [2] "foreign policy"                       
#>  [3] "security policy"                      
#>  [4] "economy"                              
#>  [5] "agriculture"                          
#>  [6] "public finance"                       
#>  [7] "energy"                               
#>  [8] "transport and infrastructure"         
#>  [9] "environment and living space"         
#> [10] "social policy"                        
#> [11] "education and research"               
#> [12] "culture, religion and media"
